last_episode_to_air.name: Hat's That
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s time for a new year – and a new hat – as Jade, Jeff, and Sherri craft headpieces worth celebrating and upcycled papercrafts that turn old materials into innovative art pieces.

name: Craftopia
overview: An epic crafting competition show that features larger-than-life challenges in a magical studio that makes every crafter’s dreams come true.
tagline: The ultimate crafting competition is all grown up.

episodes.name: It’s My Party and I’ll Craft if I Want To
episodes.overview: Jonah, Annabelle, and Natalie meet their host, crafting superstar LaurDIY, before dreaming up party concepts and creating themed invitations to match. Whimsical street artist and crochet master London Kaye helps judges Toya and James decide who will move on to design Craftrophia-worthy 3D wall hangings.

episodes.name: Petopia
episodes.overview: We hope Nicola, Zion, and Monroe like animals, because that’s what their challenges are all about. First, they create busts of their favorite beasts. Next, the two fiercest Craftestants build custom sleep areas for pets. Extra special guest judge JP Connelly, the production designer behind Craftopia, weighs in, and Lauren’s dog Moose keeps our crafters company.

episodes.name: If The Shoe Fits, Craft It
episodes.overview: Californians Khloe, JoJo, and Ethan channel their inner fashion designers to jump on eye-catching custom sneakers and, with some guidance from guest judge, renowned stylist Anthony Elle, create a wearable, high fashion craft.

episodes.name: The Right Stuffed
episodes.overview: Tida, Brodie, and Iris face-off in a couple of super sweet challenges. First up, we have a confection Quick Craft inspired by what guest judge Rosanna Pansino does best: baking! After incorporating bakery goods into edible masterpieces, two Craftestants channel their talents into adorable plushie-making.

episodes.name: It's Lit!
episodes.overview: Spunky 12-year-olds Ava, Cooper, and Sasha must turn paper lanterns into unique, whimsical works of art before the two most lit creators advance to an ambitious Craft Master Challenge: elevate the classic lemonade stand concept into an innovative small business idea. Pinterest goddess Joy Cho helps our judges decide whose stand and product sample are truly Craftrophia-worthy.

episodes.name: New Backpack, Who Dis?
episodes.overview: Weber, Brooklyn, and Ceres plunge into two school-inspired challenges: first, they transform lockers into creative masterpieces, and next, the top Craftestants turn ordinary backpacks into something super special. Guest judge Jodi Levine helps determine which crafter will take home the Craftrophia.

episodes.name: Treecycled
episodes.overview: Aria, Max, and Clara think outside the box to create handmade plants and flowers before the two remaining crafters tackle an upcycling Craft Master Challenge that finds them transforming trashcans full of waste materials into something magical. Guest judge Anjelika Temple has some tough decisions in store.

episodes.name: It’s Party Slime
episodes.overview: Chuk, Suhani, and Lily have their work cut out for them with a sticky Quick Craft inspired by guest judge Karina Garcia, the “Slime Queen.” Using Karina’s favorite gooey ingredient, our crafters whip up fake food that looks good enough to eat. The two top chefs then tackle a daunting challenge: create life-size doll boxes that tell a story about who they are.

episodes.name: Craftenstein's Monster
episodes.overview: 15-year-old Californians Kaya, Angel, and Erin spook the judges with Halloween-inspired mobiles before taking their shot at a Craft Master Challenge so wicked it’ll give you head-to-toe chills. As the two creepiest Craftestants construct haunting costumes with a light-up twist, Anjelika Temple returns to help Toya and James decide whose ghoulish getup is truly electrifying.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Craft Street
episodes.overview: Adalyn, Sasha, and Sabrina transform boring paper-mache pinatas into terrifying monstrous creations before the Craft Master Challenge finds two of these 11-year-olds turning ordinary dollhouses into creepified haunted abodes. Anjelika Temple brings the fear factor to the judges’ panel as they make some bloodcurdling decisions.

episodes.name: Merry Craftmas!
episodes.overview: It’s the most wonderful time of the year, for crafting! For their Quick Craft, Kyndal, Sierra, and James set out to find the perfect ingredients to create festive holiday dessert platters. Next, two merry Craftestants incorporate a little piece of home into their handiwork while turning mantles into holiday masterpieces. Guest judge Rosanna Pansino is back to light up Craftopia with her bubbly baker’s spirit.

episodes.name: Craft the Halls
episodes.overview: Julianne, Cooper, and Iva race against the clock to dream up one-of-a-kind holiday countdown calendars that’ll keep the judges smiling for days. And since nothing says "holiday spirit" quite like whimsical window displays, next, two talented crafters tackle this tradition with their very own storefront designs. Wrap god Alton DuLaney drops in to help Toya and James bring one extra lucky Craftestant some majorly good tidings.

episodes.name: Candy Couture
episodes.overview: Nigel, Tiffany, and Cheyenne hope to get ahead of the challenge with their wow-worthy wigs before crafting chic looks with candy.

episodes.name: Bow-Wow Ween
episodes.overview: It’s dog-gone spooky as Ashley, Sean, and Edgar outfit a trio of canine companions before decking themselves out for a spooky split-personality costume challenge.

episodes.name: Scary Delicious
episodes.overview: Craftestants Ivonne, Miso, and Chris let their talent ooze in a spooky cooking challenge before getting their hands dirty with protruding prosthetics.

episodes.name: Pumpkin to Talk About
episodes.overview: Holly, Jarret, and Mary perfect their pumpkin-carving skills before blowing up the competition with their haunting Halloween yard inflatables.

episodes.name: Make It Train
episodes.overview: Christmas magic is in the air as Annie, Glenn and Nikk craft whimsical tree-toppers and mystifying miniatures for a guest judge from the wizarding world.

episodes.name: Holiday on Wheels
episodes.overview: Jom, Michelle, and Jim ignite the competition with captivating candles before putting the pedal to the metal to customize vibrant holiday-inspired vehicles.

episodes.name: Totally Tree-ifying
episodes.overview: Amber, Jane, and Zard craft holiday decorations made entirely from sweet treats before a spine-tingling turn has them transforming ordinary Christmas trees into terrifying monsters.

episodes.name: Hat's That
episodes.overview: It’s time for a new year – and a new hat – as Jade, Jeff, and Sherri craft headpieces worth celebrating and upcycled papercrafts that turn old materials into innovative art pieces.
